oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Survey & Mines topographical maps of Western Desert Province, Markaz Maryût
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah wa-al-Manājim
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Topographic maps showing areas in the Western Desert Province around Markaz Maryût. The maps were surveyed in 1940, although publication date is listed as 1939.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Western Desert (Egypt) -- Maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; the American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: This item is in the public domain.
